mapper.select: SELECT NAME,SPECIFICATION, SUM(NUM) AS NUM, CASE WHEN IS_WANCHENG = 1 THEN '已完成'WHEN IS_WANCHENG IS NULL THEN '点击完成'END AS IS_WANCHENG FROM OFFICESUPPLIESDATA WHERE YEAR(MONTH) * 100 + MONTH(MONTH) = #{month} AND STATE = 1 GROUP BY NAME ,SPECIFICATION,IS_WANCHENG

SELECT NAME,RENSHI_ADVICE,FUZONG_ADVICE,CAIWU_ADVICE,ACCOUNTID_3 FROM OFFICESUPPLIESDATA WHERE YEAR(MONTH) * 100 + MONTH(MONTH) = #{month} AND STATE = 1 GROUP BY NAME,RENSHI_ADVICE,FUZONG_ADVICE,CAIWU_ADVICE,ACCOUNTID_3

choose.when: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID IN(SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = 0)) AND ID = #{deptId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN(SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = 0))) AND ID = #{deptId}

mapper.select:
SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME,ACCOUNT_ID,POSITION_NAME,NAME,POSITIONTYPE_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON POSITION_DATA.POSITION_ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_TYPE ON POSITION_DATA.POSITIONTYPE_ID = POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID
AND STATE = '1' AND ISDELETE = '0'
AND (DEPARTMENT_ID = 39) AND POSITION_NAME = '办公室主任' AND (DEPARTMENT_ID = 50) AND (POSITION_NAME = '副总经理' OR POSITION_NAME = '集团总经理助理')
AND (POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID = 5 OR POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID = 6 )
AND ( DEPARTMENT_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN ( SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId} ) ) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId} ) OR DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId} )
AND (DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId} OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId}) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId})))
AND (DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId} OR DEPARTMENT_ID = (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId}) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId} )) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId} ))))

SELECT EMP_NAME, ACCOUNT_ID, POSITION_NAME, NAME, POSITIONTYPE_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON POSITION_DATA.POSITION_ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_TYPE ON POSITION_DATA.POSITIONTYPE_ID = POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID
AND ACCOUNT_STATE = '在用'
AND POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID = 6
AND DEPARTMENT_ID = 50 AND POSITION_NAME = '副总经理'
AND POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID = 6 AND DEPARTMENT_ID = 39

SELECT EMP_NAME, ACCOUNT_ID, POSITION_NAME, NAME, POSITIONTYPE_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON POSITION_DATA.POSITION_ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_TYPE ON POSITION_DATA.POSITIONTYPE_ID = POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID
AND ACCOUNT_STATE = '在用'
AND DEPARTMENT_ID = (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId})
AND DEPARTMENT_ID = ( SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId}) )
AND DEPARTMENT_ID = 50 AND POSITION_NAME = '副总经理'
AND POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID = 6 AND DEPARTMENT_ID = 39
SELECT ACCOUNT_ID,ACCOUNT_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA WHERE DEPARTMENT_ID = 54 AND POSITION_ID = 35

SELECT EMP_NAME,V.ACCOUNT_ID,POSITION_NAME,NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA V LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA PD ON PD.POSITION_ID = V.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT TD ON TD.ID = V.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT_RULE_DATA ARD ON V.ACCOUNT_ID = ARD.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE ACCOUNT_STATE = '在用' AND ARD.RULE_ID = 76

SELECT EMP_NAME, ACCOUNT_ID, POSITION_NAME, NAME, POSITIONTYPE_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON POSITION_DATA.POSITION_ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_TYPE ON POSITION_DATA.POSITIONTYPE_ID = POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID WHERE ACCOUNT_STATE = '在用' AND POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID = 6 AND DEPARTMENT_ID = 39

SELECT EMP_NAME,ACCOUNT_ID,POSITION_NAME,NAME,POSITIONTYPE_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON POSITION_DATA.POSITION_ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_TYPE ON POSITION_DATA.POSITIONTYPE_ID = POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID
AND ACCOUNT_STATE = '在用' AND DEPARTMENT_ID = 50
AND POSITION_NAME = '副总经理'
AND POSITION_NAME = '总经理'
SELECT ID, NAME FROM OFFICEDATA
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OFFICEUSERDATA (OFFICEID, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, ACCOUNTID, ACCOUNTZT, REMARK, STATE, NUM, USER_NAME, TYPE, YUYUE_TIME) VALUES (#{officeId}, #{startTime},#{endTime}, #{accountId}, #{accountZt}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{num}, #{userName}, #{type}, #{yuYueTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE OFFICEUSERDATA SET STATE = #{state} WHERE ID = #{id} AND (STATE = 0 OR STATE = 2)
AND GETDATE() > STARTTIME
mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_ID FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON V_ACCOUNTDATA .POSITION_ID = POSITION_DATA .POSITION_ID WHERE POSITION_DATA.POSITION_NAME = '副总经理' AND STATE = 1

SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME,ACCOUNT_ID,POSITION_NAME,NAME,POSITIONTYPE_NAME FROM V_ACCOUNTDATA LEFT JOIN POSITION_DATA ON POSITION_DATA.POSITION_ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.ID = V_ACCOUNTDATA.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION_TYPE ON POSITION_DATA.POSITIONTYPE_ID = POSITION_TYPE.POSITIONTYPE_ID WHERE STATE = '1' AND ISDELETE = '0' AND (POSITION_TYPE .POSITIONTYPE_ID = #{postTypeId} OR POSITION_NAME = '项目经理')
AND DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId}
AND (DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId})) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId}) OR DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId})
AND (DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId} OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId} ) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId} )))
AND (DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId} OR DEPARTMENT_ID = (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId}) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId} )) OR DEPARTMENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENTID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID IN (SELECT PARENTID FROM T_DEPARTMENT WHERE ID = #{deptId}))))
